description: News is emerging of growing numbers of deaths from coronavirus in care homes across Europe.
title: Coronavirus: The grim crisis in Europe's care homes
title_page: Coronavirus: The grim crisis in Europe's care homes - BBC News
maintext: More than a third of care homes in the Paris region alone are thought to have been affected by coronavirus. But while hospital deaths are recorded in the daily toll of coronavirus, deaths in care homes are not.
